result.reason: Feature request to search session output is valid and has been implemented using a clipboard-based extraction workaround due to PuTTY limitations.
result.approach: Use PuTTY's internal 'Copy All' command (0x0170) to dump the session buffer to the clipboard, then load it into a searchable text dialog (FrmFind).
